Text:
Very nice funny movie, imdb rating just wrong, in its genre it deserves no less than 7.0/10 I'd say. 
 So it was well worth demuxing the USA HD-DVD which is the only available HD 1080p version around and turn it into a Blu-Ray with custom menu. 
 As per description the best was done to obtain maximum quality. 
 Maggie Q actress fans should watch this movie in HD..
